description:
"Glowing fists...?"
Based on the burn marks left on Guise`s body, Kenshiro, Ye, Zi-Ying, and Yasaka arrive at one answer when discussing who killed him. On a hill near the church, Erika is praying over Fei-Yan`s grave. Yasaka approaches to ask for her forgiveness. When she sees the glowing jewels dangling around his neck, she reveals their surprising past. Meanwhile, Kenshiro`s surroundings suddenly grow dark with the color of the Nahash people...
Source: crunchyroll
